synopsis.text: It's summer vacation and Maiku is struggling to get his work done with Karen clinging to him constantly and Miina also vying for his attention. Seeking peace and quiet, he decides to go camping alone in the woods to focus. However, his solitude is short-lived when Morino organizes a surprise class trip to the same spot, encouraging everyone to make summer memories. Romantic entanglements ensue in the forest, with Miina hoping for some alone time with Maiku and Karen trying to foil her plans. Meanwhile, rumors swirl of a female ghost haunting the woods and preying on lonely men. Is the ghost real or is it another one of Ichigo's mischievous plots involving hidden cameras? As couples pair off among the students, comedic hijinks and drama unfold. Will Miina finally confess her feelings to Maiku or will Karen interfere? Will the unlucky Matagu have romantic success? And what mischief does Ichigo have in store with her secret cameras in the woods?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
